channel.title: monome
channel.description: sound machines for the exploration of time and space

item.title: monome
item.description: 02/01/23 - crow is returning. some of the long-time part shortages have eased and we've started receiving components. we're working on some software improvements in anticipation of shipping a new batch. dates will be announced soon.

item.title: monome
item.description: 01/01/23 - shipping updates now have a dedicated page.
